data.name: MetaShooter
data.detailed_description:
ABOUT THIS GAME

MetaShooter brings together millions of gamers from all over the world to form a community in which they may engage in realistic hunting in open world environments, build their characters and hunting grounds, gain levels, unlock a variety of weapons, and do a great deal more.

TAKE PART IN AUTHENTIC HUNTING

(vid - showcase some animals behaviour, different weather)
The open world is filled with rare animals and opportunities, designed in such a way to always keep you engaged and give you the sensation of a real wild hunt!

CUSTOMISE & UPGRADE

Upgrade your hunting gear and personalise your character in any way that strikes your fancy!
With a diverse selection of options, ranging from rifles to bows, and even vehicles.
With the use of callers and baits, you will be able to coax your prey into a trap.

DEVELOP YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE APPROACH TO HUNTING

(Vid - Hunters is hunting for the animal, climbing on tower, watching with binoculars (3-4 different scenes)
Create the ideal hunting environment by developing your hunting lands, constructing towers, and breeding hunting dogs.

DISCOVER THE VASTNESS OF THE OPEN WORLD

Explore a variety of environments while taking in jaw-dropping visuals and absorbing gameplay.

data.short_description: MetaShooter is a real-world simulation-based FPS hunting game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 8 / (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
